get.description: Returns a list of all available courses. If no courses are found, a 204 status is returned.

post.description: Creates a new course with provided details. The course is assigned to the currently authenticated admin.

description.example: A program focused on computer science.

get.summary: Get details of a specific course
get.description: Fetches and returns a course by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the course

message.example: Please check the Id of the course then try again

put.description: Update the details of a specific course by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the course to be updated

description.example: This is a bachelor in Application description
This is a bachelor in Application description

message.example: Please check the Id of the user then try again

delete.description: Deletes a specific course by its ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the course to delete

message.example: Please check the Id of the user then try again

get.description: This endpoint retrieves all users whose role is either 'lecturer' or 'student'. If no such users are found, it returns a message stating 'No data found'.

200.description: List of users with roles 'lecturer' or 'student' retrieved successfully.

post.description: This endpoint allows the creation of a new user with roles 'lecturer' or 'student'. The user's username, email, and password are required, with validation applied for uniqueness and format.

get.description: This endpoint retrieves a user by their ID. It ensures the user has a role of 'lecturer' or 'student'. If the user is not found or does not meet the criteria, an error message is returned.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to retrieve

404.description: User not found or invalid role

message.example: Please check the Id of the user then try again

put.description: This endpoint updates a user by their ID. It ensures the user has a role of 'lecturer' or 'student'. If the user is not found or does not meet the criteria, an error message is returned.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to update

404.description: User not found or invalid role

delete.description: This endpoint deletes a user by their ID. It ensures that the user has a role of 'lecturer' or 'student'. If the user is not found or does not meet the criteria, an error message is returned.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to delete

404.description: User not found or invalid role

post.description: Allows users to log in using email and password. Upon successful login, a personal access token is returned for further authenticated requests.
Logs out the user by revoking all personal access tokens.

get.summary: Fetch dashboard data based on user role (admin or lecturer)

message.example: Role not permitted to access dashboard.
Only lecturers can access this resource.

get.description: Returns a list of enrollments. Admins get all enrollments, while students get their own.

post.summary: Enroll a student in a course
post.description: Allows a student user to enroll in a course. Prevents duplicate enrollments and ensures only students can access this endpoint.

403.description: Only students can enroll in courses

error.example: Only students can enroll in courses

409.description: Student already enrolled in the course

error.example: You are already enrolled in this course

get.summary: Get list of available courses for enrollment
get.description: Returns all courses that were added by the admin. This list is used for student enrollments.

200.description: List of courses or a message if none found

description.example: This is a bachelor in Application description

get.description: Admins can view any enrollment. Students can view only their own enrollment.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the enrollment

put.description: Admins can update the enrollment status (approve/reject), while students can cancel (or delete) their own enrollment if allowed.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the enrollment

status.description: Only for admins to update the enrollment status

course_id.description: Only for students to update their own enrollment

get.description: Retrieve all groups along with their associated course and group members. Admin access required.

post.description: Create a group by providing course_id and group_name. Admin access required.

get.description: Fetches a group with its associated course and members by ID. Admin access required.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Group ID

message.example: Please check the Id of the user then try again

put.description: Updates the specified group's name and course ID. Only admins are allowed.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Group ID to update

message.example: Please check the Id of the user then try again

items.example: The group name field is required.

delete.description: Deletes a specific group by ID. Only accessible by admins.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Group ID to delete

message.example: Please check the Id of the user then try again

get.description: Retrieves a list of members in a specific group along with their user details.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Group ID to fetch members for

200.description: List of members in the group

message.example: Please check the Id of the user then try again

post.summary: Add a member to a group
post.description: Adds a member to a specific group. The user cannot be added if they are already a member.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Group ID to add the member to

409.description: User is already a member of this group

error.example: User is already a member of this group

message.example: Please check the Id of the user then try again

delete.summary: Remove a member from a group
delete.description: Removes a specific member from a group. The group and member must exist.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Group ID from which the member will be removed

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Member ID to be removed from the group

message.example: Please check the Id of the user then try again

post.summary: Add multiple members to a group
post.description: Adds multiple users to a specific group. Ensures that users are not already members of the group.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Group ID to which the members will be added

requestBody.description: List of user IDs to be added to the group

message.example: Please check the Id of the user then try again

delete.summary: Add multiple members to a group
delete.description: Adds multiple users to a specific group. Ensures that users are not already members of the group.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Group ID to which the members will be added

requestBody.description: List of user IDs to be added to the group

message.example: Please check the Id of the user then try again

get.description: Returns a list of assignments created by the authenticated lecturer along with course information.

title.example: This is title of the assignment

description.example: This is description of the assignment

message.example: Something went wrong while fetching assignments.

post.description: Creates an assignment for a course assigned to the authenticated lecturer.

title.example: This is title of the assignment 2

description.example: This is description of the assignment

title.example: This is title of the assignment 2

description.example: This is description of the assignment

message.example: An unexpected error occurred while creating the assignment.

get.summary: Fetch courses assigned to the lecturer
get.description: Returns a list of courses associated with the authenticated lecturer's groups. This is used when creating new assignments.

404.description: Lecturer not assigned to groups or no courses found

message.example: You are not assigned to any groups yet.
Something went wrong while fetching courses.

put.description: Allows a lecturer to update their own assignment.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the assignment to update

title.example: This is title of the assignments update 1

description.example: This is description of the assignment

title.example: This is title of the assignments update 1

description.example: This is description of the assignment

message.example: Unauthorized access to update this assignment.
An unexpected error occurred while updating the assignment.

delete.description: Allows a lecturer to delete their own assignment by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the assignment to delete

get.summary: Get group members based on authenticated user's role and groups
get.description: Returns users grouped by group name. Also includes admin info if requester is not an admin.

error.example: Something went wrong while fetching group members.

get.summary: Get all messages between authenticated user and a specific receiver
get.description: Fetches a chronological conversation between the authenticated user and the specified receiver.

parameters.name: receiverId
parameters.description: ID of the user to fetch messages with

content.example: Hello admin sent message to the user id 4

post.summary: Send message to multiple users if allowed (admin or shared group)

content.example: Hello, this is a test message

403.description: User not authorized to send messages to specified receivers

get.description: This endpoint retrieves a user by.. If the user is not found or does not meet the criteria, an error message is returned.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to retrieve

put.description: This endpoint updates a user by their token. If the user is not found or does not meet the criteria, an error message is returned.

404.description: User not found or invalid role

message.example: The old password you provided is incorrect.
An error occurred. Please try again later.

get.summary: Get assignments for the logged-in student
get.description: Retrieves assignments based on the student's enrolled groups and courses.

title.example: This is title of the assignment

description.example: This is  description of the assignment

401.description: Unauthorized access. Only students can view assignments.

message.example: Unauthorized access. Only students can view assignments.

404.description: No groups, courses, or lecturers found.

message.example: You are not assigned to any groups yet.
An unexpected error occurred while retrieving assignments.

get.description: Returns a list of all available courses. If no courses are found, a 404 status is returned.
